name: Playwriting II
description: A continuation of DRM228H1, concentrating on the in-depth knowledge and practice of playwriting with an emphasis on style and technique of writing for the stage. Students develop their own work through written assignments, in-class exercises, and the final public presentation. See Portfolio Guidelines for information on how to apply and the deadline to apply.
department: Centre for Drama, Theatre and Performance Studies
prerequisites: DRM100Y1/DRM101Y1/UNI102Y1; DRM228H1; Minimum CGPA of 2.7 and permission of the Centre. See online application for details.
